level.heading: Severability.
level.text: If any section or sections, clause or clauses, of this part, or any regulations promulgated thereunder, be declared unconstitutional or invalid, that shall not invalidate any other sections or clauses of this part, or any other regulations promulgated thereunder.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 19-171 enacted this subchapter into law.
